SAFETY
======

IMPORTANT SAFETY INFORMATION
----------------------------

.. raw:: latex

   \safetywarning{INSTRUCTIONS PERTAINING TO RISK OF FIRE, ELECTRIC SHOCK, OR INJURY TO PERSONS}

.. raw:: latex

   \begin{safetytwocol}

{{ safety_lead_top }}

{{ safety_top_items }}

.. raw:: latex

   \end{safetytwocol}

.. raw:: latex

   \safetysubbar{OPERATING INSTRUCTIONS}

.. raw:: latex

   \begin{safetytwocol}

{{ safety_save_title }}   

{{ safety_bottom_items }}

.. raw:: latex

   \end{safetytwocol}
